claims.text: The need for power is going to be more significant than anything we've seen since the postâ€“World War II industrial revolution.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: McKinsey interview discussing AI-driven electricity demand growth
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Frames the current moment as epochal transformation requiring unprecedented response

claims.text: America needs more electrons on the grid, and America needs a proven energy infrastructure builder to get the job done.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Q4 2025 Earnings Call discussing capacity to serve AI data centers
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Positions NextEra as indispensable to national AI competitiveness
claims.notes: Existing specimen quote - adapt-or-die framing at national level

claims.text: I firmly believe no one has a better team a better culture, or a better track record of execution than NextEra Energy.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Q2 2025 Earnings Call discussing organizational capabilities for AI-era energy demand
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Anchors transformation capacity in organizational character and execution culture
claims.notes: Strong identity claim - justification terminates in team/culture

claims.text: We are firmly aligned with the administration's goal to unleash American energy dominance and to do so we need all of the electrons we can get on the grid.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Q2 2025 Earnings Call linking company mission to national AI competitiveness
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Links organizational purpose to specific achievable national outcome

claims.text: As the quintessential all of the above energy company, we believe [we] build more energy infrastructure than anyone.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Q2 2025 Earnings Call positioning NextEra's unique capability for AI infrastructure build-out
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Defines organizational identity through distinctive capability claim
claims.notes: Identity claim anchored in 'all of the above' positioning

claims.text: Now is not the time to take options off the table. The stakes are too high.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Fortune op-ed on clean energy policy and AI infrastructure needs
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Frames AI moment as existential for national competitiveness - urgency rhetoric
claims.notes: Survival framing - status quo not viable, high stakes

claims.text: I expect our team to leverage AI better than anyone in America.
claims.speaker: John Ketchum
claims.speakerTitle: Chairman, President and CEO, NextEra Energy
claims.context: Q4 2025 Earnings Call discussing internal AI transformation initiative REWIRE
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Sets aspirational performance bar for AI adoption tied to organizational identity
claims.notes: Commercial success framing with identity undertone - best-in-class aspiration
